name: Rhyther
description:
Rhyther is a small Rhythm Game that was inspired by Friday Night Funkin', We are trying to make this game highly Modifiable and enjoyable!

Warning: Sense Clickteam does not have any documentation on Delta-Time your Computer HAS to  be able to play the Game at 60FPS!

Reminder: Clickteam Game's get detected as a Virus alot, This is not a Virus. Just letting yall know because i don't want yall thinking my epic game is a Virus.

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/WaN6cusVAa
